com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill

Class TargettedSkill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herocraftonline.heroes.command.BasicCommand
      • com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill.Skill
        • com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill.ActiveSkill
          • com.herocraftonline.heroes.characters.skill.TargettedSkill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SkillAntidote, SkillBandage, SkillBleed, SkillBolt, SkillCharge, SkillConfuse, SkillCurse, SkillDispel, SkillEmpathy, SkillHarmtouch, SkillInversion, SkillLayhands, SkillPickPocket, SkillPiggify, SkillPoison, SkillPray, SkillRoot, SkillSlow, SkillSmite, SkillWeb

    public abstract class TargettedSkill
extends ActiveSkill
    A triggered skill that requires a target. TargettedSkills define a maximum distance setting. A target can be supplied as the first argument to the command. If no such argument is provided, then the skill will use whatever target the player is looking at within the configurable maximum distance, if any. The primary method to be overridden by TargettedSkills is use(Hero, LivingEntity, String[]), which is called by use(Hero, String[]) after determining the target.

    Skill Framework:
    • ActiveSkill
      • ActiveEffectSkill
      • TargettedSkill
    • PassiveSkill
    • OutsourcedSkill


    See ActiveSkill for an overview of command triggered skills.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultConfig

        public org.bukkit.configuration.ConfigurationSection getDefaultConfig()
        Creates and returns a ConfigurationNode containing the default usage text and targetting range. When using additional configuration settings in your skills, be sure to override this method to define them with defaults.
        Overrides:
        getDefaultConfig in class ActiveSkill
        Returns:
        a default configuration

      • init

        public void init()
        Loads and stores the skill's usage text from the configuration. By default, this text is "%hero% used %skill% on %target!" where %hero%, %skill% and %target% are replaced with the Hero's, skill's and target's names, respectively.
        Overrides:
        init in class ActiveSkill

      • use

        public abstract SkillResult use(Hero hero,
              org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity target,
              String[] args)
        The heart of any TargettedSkill, this method defines what actually happens when the skill is used.
        Parameters:
        hero - the Hero using the skill
        args - the arguments provided with the command
        Returns:
        true if the skill executed properly, false otherwise
